overview: Pennsylvania rockers HALESTORM played a six-song set (on October 31, 2012) at Sear Sound Studios in New York City as part of The Warner Sound's "The Live Room". "The Live Room" is an exclusive The Warner Sound original series that captures today's most innovative artists performing live recording sessions in the most iconic recording studios across America. 01. Bet You Wish You Had Me Back 02. Empire State of Mind 03. Here's To Us 04. I Get Off 05. In Your Room 06. Love Bites (So Do I)
title: Halestorm: The Warner Sound Live
